home.adaptiveDesc: Automatically balanced categories based on your recent performance.

profile.dailyGoalDesc: Set your daily target to stay consistent and improve your IELTS listening score.
profile.dailyGoalInfo: Most students who score 7.0 or higher complete at least 30 questions daily for 4 consecutive weeks.
profile.dailyReminderDesc: Get a nudge to practice your dictation daily.
profile.weeklyProgressDesc: Receive a summary of your weekly performance.
profile.newModulesDesc: Alerts when new number sets or lessons are added.
profile.scheduleDesc: Choose a time that works best for you to maintain your practice streak. Consistent daily practice is key to IELTS listening success.
profile.questionsSessionDesc: Select how many numbers you want to transcribe in a single practice session. Shorter sessions are better for quick drills.
profile.resetDesc: The system adjusts frequency based on your scores in each category. Resetting will clear your personalized learning history and restore default probabilities.
profile.selectCategories: Select the types of numbers you want to practice. All categories are selected by default.
profile.minCategory: Note: At least one category must be selected to start a practice session.
profile.resetConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to reset all learning probabilities?
